title: 10b28  - Jurors.
text:
Service on
jury duty for either a petit or grand jury does not result in the establishment
of an employment relationship. Thus, all jurors and prospective jurors called
to serve by the requesting public agency are not employees under the Act.
html: Service on jury duty for either a petit or grand jury does not result in the establishment of an employment relationship. Thus, all jurors and prospective jurors called to serve by the requesting public agency are not employees under the Act.
